translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Faculties

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽9.13. Upādānagocchaka, Kusalattika🔽Noupādānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  upādāna gocchaka kusalattika  no upādānam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: The Chapter on the Triad with Disadvantage🔽With what is not subject to cankers as condition there is … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
translated: In the section on cause there are nine … In the section on result there is one … In the section on non-causality there are nine.
